title: Authors and Citation
text: Jaromil Frossard. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Frossard J (2022). TVTmatching: Match time-varying treatment. https://github.com/jaromilfrossard/TVTmatching, https://jaromilfrossard.github.io/TVTmatching/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {TVTmatching: Match with time-varying treatment},   author = {Jaromil Frossard},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/jaromilfrossard/TVTmatching, https://jaromilfrossard.github.io/TVTmatching/}, }

title: Match with time-varying treatment
text: TVTmatching implement matching algorithm time-varying treatment. case assign one several controls match time “risk treatment”.

title: Match with time-varying treatment
text: can install development version TVTmatching like :

title: Match with time-varying treatment
text: can explore controls candidate case using: can match using dates: data time can use:
code: library(TVTmatching) data("tvtdata") tvt_sum <- tvt_summary_cases(tvtdata,                              date_statrisk=stos,                              date_treatna=treatna,                              date_eos=eos,                              state_eos=eos01, by = fct) tvt_sum #> # A tibble: 4 × 10 #>   id_row time_a…¹ time_…² state…³ state…⁴ fct   data_c…⁵ n_con…⁶ state…⁷ state…⁸ #>    <int>    <dbl>   <dbl>   <int>   <int> <chr> <list>     <int>   <int>   <int> #> 1      1      366     731       1       1 A     <tibble>       2       1       1 #> 2      2      273     579       1       1 B     <tibble>       2       1       1 #> 3      3      122     821       1       0 A     <tibble>       3       1       2 #> 4      4       62     396       1       0 B     <tibble>       3       1       2 #> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​time_atrisk, ²​time_eos, ³​state_treat, #> #   ⁴​state_eos, ⁵​data_control, ⁶​n_control, ⁷​state_eos_0_control, #> #   ⁸​state_eos_1_control set.seed(42) tvt_match<- tvt_matching_date(tvtdata,stos,treatna,eos,eos01) tvt_match #> # A tibble: 8 × 5 #>   group row_id treat_tv  time_eos_tv state_eos_tv #>   <int>  <int> <chr>           <dbl>        <int> #> 1     1      1 treatment         365            1 #> 2     1      5 control           396            0 #> 3     2      2 treatment         306            1 #> 4     2      8 control           154            0 #> 5     3      3 treatment         699            0 #> 6     3      1 control           244            0 #> 7     4      4 treatment         334            0 #> 8     4      1 control           304            0 set.seed(42) tvtdata_num <- tvt_date2numeric(tvtdata,                                 date_statrisk = stos,                                 date_treatna = treatna,                                 date_eos = eos,                                 state_eos = eos01) tvt_match2 <- tvt_matching_num(tvtdata_num,                                time_atrisk = time_atrisk,                                time_eos = time_eos,                                state_eos = state_eos,                                state_treat = state_treat) tvt_match2 #> # A tibble: 8 × 5 #>   group row_id treat_tv  time_eos_tv state_eos_tv #>   <int>  <int> <chr>           <dbl>        <int> #> 1     1      1 treatment         365            1 #> 2     1      5 control           396            0 #> 3     2      2 treatment         306            1 #> 4     2      8 control           154            0 #> 5     3      3 treatment         699            0 #> 6     3      1 control           244            0 #> 7     4      4 treatment         334            0 #> 8     4      1 control           304            0

what: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
text: Pool estimate using Rubin Rules

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
code: pooling_rubin(estimate, std.error, df = NA_real_, term = NULL)

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
text: estimate List. element list vector pseudo estimates length \(m\). std.error List. standard error estimates. df Numeric. Indicates degrees freedom test. term Character. Indicates names estimates.

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
text: data frame pooled results

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
text: function adapted mice::pool() function.

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
text: Rubin, D.B. (1987). Multiple Imputation Nonresponse Surveys. New York: John Wiley Sons. Van Buuren, S., Groothuis-Oudshoorn, K., & Robitzsch, . (2019). Package ‘mice’: multivariate imputation chained equations. CRAN Repos.

title: Pool estimate using the Rubin Rules — pooling_rubin
code: if (FALSE) { library(survival) data(tvtdata2)  list_data_surv <- replicate(n = 3,     {tvt_matching_date(tvtdata2,date_statrisk = stos,treatna,eos,eos01)},     simplify = F)  list_data_surv <- lapply(list_data_surv, \(di){     di%>%       bind_cols(tvtdata2%>%       select(eos01,fct_2lvl,fct_4lvl,xcov)%>%       slice(tvt_new$id_row))})  list_coxph <- lapply(list_data_surv, \(di){     coxph(Surv(time_eos_tv,state_eos_tv)~treat_tv+xcov,data= di)})  estim <- lapply(list_coxph,coef) var <- lapply(list_coxph,\(x){sqrt(diag(x$var))}) df <- list_coxph[[1]]$n-length(lestim[[1]]) term <- names(lestim[[1]]) pooling_rubin(estim,var,df,term) }

title: Matching with time-varying treatment — tvt_date2numeric
text: Matching time-varying treatment

title: Matching with time-varying treatment — tvt_date2numeric
code: tvt_date2numeric(   data,   date_statrisk,   date_treatna,   date_eos,   state_eos,   date_eoatrisk = NULL )  tvt_matching_date(   data,   date_statrisk,   date_treatna,   date_eos,   state_eos,   date_eoatrisk = NULL,   ratio = 1,   by = NULL )  tvt_matching_num(   data,   time_atrisk,   time_eos,   state_treat,   state_eos,   ratio = 1,   by = NULL )  tvt_summary_cases(   data,   date_statrisk,   date_treatna,   date_eos,   state_eos,   date_eoatrisk = NULL,   by = NULL )

title: Matching with time-varying treatment — tvt_date2numeric
text: data data frame date_statrisk column names date patients start risk treatment. date_treatna column names date start treatment NA's untreated subjects. date_eos column names date end study state_eos column names indicating state end study date_eoatrisk column names date patient end "risk treatment". Specify date_eos ending "risk treatment" period corresponds end study. ratio Integer. controls per cases. column names indicating grouping factor matching. time_atrisk column names integer representing length "risk treatment" period. time_eos column names integer representing length study. state_treat column names indicating subject experimented treatment

title: Matching with time-varying treatment — tvt_date2numeric
text: tvt_summary_cases() function return tibble information control candidates case. tvt_date2numeric() convert encoding event dates numeric. tvt_matching_date() tvt_matching_num() perform matching algorithm.

title: Matching with time-varying treatment — tvt_date2numeric
code: data("tvtdata") tvtdata_num <- tvt_date2numeric(tvtdata,stos,treatna,eos,eos01) tvt_sum <- tvt_summary_cases(tvtdata,stos,treatna,eos,eos01, by = fct)  set.seed(42) tvt_match<- tvt_matching_date(tvtdata,stos,treatna,eos,eos01)  set.seed(42) tvt_match2 <- tvt_matching_num(tvtdata_num,time_atrisk,time_eos,state_eos,state_treat)

title: Testing Data — tvtdata
text: simulated dataset

title: Testing Data — tvtdata
text: dataframe 8 rows 5 columns: stos Date. Starting date study. treatna Date. Date time-varying treatment. Contains NA's untreated patients. eos Date. Date end study. eos01 Integer. State end study. fct Character. 2 level factor.

title: Testing Data 2 — tvtdata2
text: simulated dataset

title: Testing Data 2 — tvtdata2
text: dataframe 200 rows 9 columns: stos Date. Starting date study. treatna Date. Date time-varying treatment. Contains NA's untreated patients. eos Date. Date end study. eostreat Date. Date end period risk treatment. eos01 Integer. State end study. fct_2lvl Character. 2 level factor. fct_4lvl Character. 4 level factor. xcov Integer. covariate numeric.
